statements: DELETE FROM student_demographics WHERE age < 20 AND enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
DELETE FROM student_demographics WHERE student_id = 101 AND enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
DELETE FROM student_demographics WHERE age > 20 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM student_demographics WHERE student_id = 101 AND student_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM enrollment_numbers WHERE enrollment_id = 201 AND program_name = 'Computer Science' AND enrollment_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 201 AND course_id = 301 AND grade = 'A';
DELETE FROM Students WHERE birthdate < '2000-01-01' AND gender = 'Male';
